summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley to an individual with the email address jeevacation@gmail.com. The email expresses sentiments about being in Bequia and wishes safe travels to Paris, while also thanking the recipient for their friendship.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email, expressing personal sentiments and gratitude towards the recipient.

keyFacts: The email was sent on January 21, 2011.
Jes Staley expresses enjoyment of being in Bequia.
The email includes a friendly message wishing safe travels to Paris.
